    • メソッドの詳細

      • copy

        public Advancement.Builder copy()
        Creates a new advancement builder with the data from this advancement

      • getParent

        @Nullable
public Advancement getParent()
        Get the Advancement that is this Advancement's parent. This determines the tree structure that appears in the GUI.
        戻り値:
        the parent Advancement of this Advancement, or null to signify that this Advancement is a root with no parent.

      • getDisplay

        @Nullable
public DisplayInfo getDisplay()
        Get information that defines this Advancement's appearance in GUIs.
        戻り値:
        information that defines this Advancement's appearance in GUIs. If null, signifies an invisible Advancement.

      • getRewards

        public AdvancementRewards getRewards()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        オーバーライド:
        toString クラス内 java.lang.Object

      • getChildren

        public java.lang.Iterable<Advancement> getChildren()
        Get the children of this Advancement.
        戻り値:
        an Iterable of this Advancement's children.
        関連項目:
        getParent()

      • getCriteria

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Criterion> getCriteria()
        Get the Criteria used to decide the completion of this Advancement. Each key-value pair consists of a Criterion and its name.
        戻り値:
        the criteria used to decide the completion of this Advancement
        関連項目:
        getRequirements()

      • getRequirementCount

        public int getRequirementCount()
        Get how many requirements this Advancement has.
        戻り値:
        this.getRequirements().length
        関連項目:
        getRequirements()

        public void addChild(Advancement advancementIn)
        Add the given Advancement as a child of this Advancement.

        Get this Advancement's unique identifier.
        戻り値:

      • equals

        オーバーライド:

        オーバーライド:

      • getRequirements

        public java.lang.String[][] getRequirements()

      • getDisplayText

        public ITextComponent getDisplayText()
        Returns the ITextComponent that is shown in the chat message sent after this Advancement is completed.
        戻り値:
        the ITextComponent that is shown in the chat message sent after this Advancement is completed. If this Advancement is invisible, then it consists simply of getId(). Otherwise, it is the title inside square brackets, colored by the frame type, and hovering over it shows the description.
